sourcesContent:
Joined Team {{member.name}} 
You can also Add {{member.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { headerList, popupData } from 'src/app/interfaces/interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-organizational-account', templateUrl: './organizational-account.component.html', styleUrls: ['./organizational-account.component.scss'] }) export class OrganizationalAccountComponent { data:headerList[]=[ { id : 1, isSelected : true, label : 'Joined' }, { id : 2, isSelected : false, label : 'Suggestions' } ]; selectedid:number = 1; getSelectedOne(item:headerList){ console.log(item.label); this.selectedid = item.id; } joinedList = [ {id: 1, name: 'Anusha'}, {id: 2, name: 'madhuri'} ]; suggestionList = [ {id: 3, name: 'sindhu'}, {id: 4, name: 'priya'} ] showAlert : boolean = false; deleteClicked(member:any){ this.AlertData[0].accountName = member.name; this.showAlert = true; this.suggestionList.push(member); this.joinedList.splice(member,1); } addClicked(member:any){ this.joinedList.push(member); this.suggestionList.splice(member,1); } AlertData:popupData[]=[ { warningName : 'Remove User', accountName : '', buttonName : 'Remove User', detailsList : [ {sno:1,content:'Access any Projects related to this Accound'}, {sno:2,content:'Any Personal Data Synced with this Account'}] } ]; clickedButtonName = 'Cancel' getButtonName(clickedButtonName:any){ this.clickedButtonName = clickedButtonName; if(clickedButtonName == 'Cancel'){this.showAlert=false} else if(clickedButtonName == this.AlertData[0].buttonName){ } } }
